meanings.definition: To bring to a premature end because of a problem or fault.
meanings.sent1: The chef aborts the cooking when the oven malfunctions.
meanings.sent2: She aborts the game due to heavy rain.
meanings.sent3: The student aborts his attempt at a perfect score after realizing he forgot his calculator.
meanings.sent4: The plan to go hiking aborts when a thunderstorm rolls in.
meanings.sent5: The teacher aborts the lesson halfway through due to technical difficulties.

meanings.definition: To terminate a pregnancy before the fetus is viable.
meanings.sent1: The doctor aborts the procedure due to unforeseen complications.
meanings.sent2: She decides to abort the pregnancy for personal reasons.
meanings.sent3: The couple sadly aborts their plans for a baby shower.
meanings.sent4: The character in the novel chooses to abort her pregnancy to pursue her career.
meanings.sent5: The young woman must make a difficult choice to abort the pregnancy.

meanings.definition: An act of aborting a mission, project, or process.
meanings.sent1: The aborts of the space mission were disappointing to the team.
meanings.sent2: The sudden aborts of the project left everyone confused.
meanings.sent3: The aborts of the play rehearsal turned into a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected aborts of the company's expansion plans shocked the employees.
meanings.sent5: The aborts of the meeting caused chaos in the office.
